title: Question 6
prompt: The student doing this experiment is measuring the growth of the three plants. Which factor does this experiment measure the effects of?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback: The measurements that the student records will show the difference in growth between the three plants. The factor that will affect these differences is the factor that is different for each plant. The only difference between the plants that is shown in the diagram is light. The diagram shows that each plant has a different type of light: full light, half light, or shade. The experiment will measure the effects of light on the plants.
